items.title: Saakashvili handed further four years in jail
items.description: The former president of Georgia has been imprisoned since 2021 when he returned to the country.

items.title: Taiwan revokes visa of pro-Beijing Chinese influencer
items.description: The woman has attracted criticism over videos calling for the unification of Taiwan with mainland China.

items.title: 'I had one child and I lost him' - North Macedonia mourns nightclub disaster
items.description: Fifty-nine people have been killed following a fire at a nightclub in North Macedonia.

items.title: Fresh US strikes in Yemen with 53 now dead, Houthis say
items.description: The US said it launched a "decisive and powerful" wave of air strikes on Houthi targets on Saturday.

items.title: Forever 21 files for bankruptcy in the US
items.description: US stores will remain open as Forever 21's operating company "begins its process of "winding down".
